department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for X-Ray Repairs on an as-needed basis in northern Manitoba.
description: Establish a contract with task authorizations (TA) for onsite repair, maintenance and inspection services of medical x-ray equipment.
duration_in_months: With a contract expiry date of 2024-08-30 and retaining an irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to three additional one-year periods;
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### X-Ray Repairs

* **Tender ID**: 5A316-225331
* **Reference Number**: WS3962984970-Doc3963018950
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: July 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Until August 2, 2024, with option for three (3) additional 1-year periods

**Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others

**Delivery Requirements**
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba
* **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Agency Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Bid Submission Requirements**
* **Bid Submission Contact**: Erin Kaiser, Erin.Schneider@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Attachments**: None
* **Bid Submission URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16782912?extsite=MTY3ODI5MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description**
The Department of Indigenous Services Canada, Winnipeg, Manitoba, requires the repair, maintenance, and inspection of on-site medical x-ray equipment in northern Manitoba on a requested basis. This bid solicitation aims to establish a service contract with task authorizations for a period of up to two years, with an option for three additional one-year periods. All bids must be submitted by July 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET.
